title: Make better servers please this game is 10 years old
body:
3rd time this week i have had my game crash. A message pops up saying "this might take up to 5 minutes to repair". So I just restart my pc and get a leaver buster when I get back on league. bye bye LP :)  i haven't had this issue in the past so idk what the problem is. ( Also I have already used the hex tech repair tool)

Update: Riot is aware of this problem and investigating it.(patch 9.11)

replies.body:
* The servers have absolutely nothing to do with your game crashing. That is corrupted files, likely a dying hard drive if it is happening that often

* The servers are also not 10 years old, that is not how it works.
It sounds like an issue on your side
